name: TapTap!
description:
This game is a recreation of a Scratch game. I take no credit for the idea.

I just did this for fun and was happy with how it turned out :)

https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/761516814/

• TapTap • An Accuracy Game •

 • Goal • 

• Score the most points by hitting the target when an object of the same shape and color overlaps it! •

• Commands • 

• Click or press space • 

• You need more help? • Click on the 'How to play' button! •
